MDI Group provides a full range of workforce solutions helping IT leaders continually transform operations, enhance performance, or gain a competitive advantage.  We partner with local companies struggling to find the best fit IT talent and build an IT workforce plan that takes into account roles, skills, competencies, and cultural fit to drive solutions for their current technology challenges.Do you know anyone struggling with the same issue?

Helping clients achieve their technology goals efficiently and with the best talent.  Partnered with organizations to find permanent, contract to hire and staff augmentation for special projects including IT expertise in:■ Apps, System, Web Development: Java, .NET, Visual Basic, C#, C, PHP and more■ ERP/CRM/SFA: Salesforce, Microsoft Dynamics, Siebel, SAP, PeopleSoft, Workday■ Database Development: Oracle, SQL,Biztalk, Business Intelligence, Weblogic, Oracle EBS and more■ Network/Hardware/Infrastructure Operations: Cisco, PC Support, Windows Operating Systems, ITIL, Firewalls, VPN■ Business Analysts, System Analysts, QA Managers, Test Automation

Shannon worked with me to re-package my resume in a way that highlighted my best career attributes with creative flair. Shannon not only accomplished this for me, but she took the time to talk with me on the phone several times and also in person at my request. She cares not only about the resume -- but the person behind it -- and I appreciate this as her client and new friend. Thank you Shannon, and I will recommend your resume services to anyone, anytime!

April 3, 2013, Brian worked with Shannon in different groups

Shannon and I worked together from September 2000 until March 2006. During this time Shannon supported me as the primary Project Manager on several projects. One of the projects we worked closely on was the deployment of a help desk tool which at the time was called Magic Help Desk from Network Associates. This tool is now known under the name BMC Service Desk express. During the deployment Shannon organized several project meetings with the individual stakeholders. She also created the project plan for the roll out. Shannon developed the process and procedures on how the tool would be used. The first phase of the project included rolling the tool out to all of TeleTech 35 calls centers nationwide including Canada. Shannon’s demonstrated superior organizational skills. She made it look effortless the way she kept all the moving pieces of the project on track and under budget. Shannon is deadline driven, results oriented, and has a strong desire to bring out the best in those with whom she is interacting. I highly recommend Shannon for any position as she will excel at any task placed before her.Brian BanksRHCT RHCSA MCSE VC-MIA VC-VIP

His dedication to his work is commendable, as he worked long hours to get the job done.  He was reliable, dependable and very easy to work with.
